category: Best Actor in a Leading Role

nominations.notes: Nomination and award were posthumous. Finch became the first posthumous winner in an acting category. His widow Eletha Finch and screenwriter Paddy Chayefsky accepted the award on his behalf.

Sylvester Stallone becomes the third person to be nominated for both acting and writing in the same year, following Charles Chaplin for The Great Dictator (1940) and Orson Welles for Citizen Kane (1941).

category: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
Best Actress in a Leading Role
Best Actress in a Supporting Role

nominations.notes: Danilo Donati was not present at the awards ceremony. Presenter Tamara Dobson accepted the award on his behalf.
Lina Wertmüller becomes the first woman to be nominated for Best Director.

primary.name: Volcano: An Inquiry Into the Life and Death of Malcolm Lowry

nominations.notes: For the song "Evergreen (Love Theme from A Star Is Born)"
For the song "A World that Never Was"

category: Best Music, Original Song Score and Its Adaptation or Best Adaptation Score

nominations.notes: 'Network' becomes the second film to win three awards for acting, following A Streetcar Named Desire (1951).

category: Best Writing, Screenplay Based on Material from Another Medium
Best Writing, Screenplay Written Directly for the Screen
